Sequence Information.Peptide Name: GLRC-6 (Synthetic AMPs, variant of GLR-19, Arg-rich; Leu-rich; 1S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature.Author: Wang G, Watson KM, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Buckheit RW Jr. 2011
Literature.Reference: J AIDS Clinic Res S2:003. doi:10.4172/2155-6113.S2-003.Wang HIV screen project
Literature.Title:
De Novo Design of Antiviral and Antibacterial Peptides with 
Varying Loop Structures

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (84.21%) toGLRC-2. R: 38%; L: 38%.; G=C: 13%.Chemical modification:  one disulfide bond C1-C13.Activity: inhibited E. coli (MIC 60 uM); B. subtilis (MIC 60 uM).Toxicity: TC50 >100 ug/ml in CEM-SS cells.
